    @Mojo(name="testCompile",
      defaultPhase=TEST_COMPILE)
public class ModuleInfoTestCompilerPlugin
extends BaseModuleInfoCompilerPlugin
    A maven plugin for compiler module-info files in unit tests with JDK8.
